Container.Name: HandBrake
Container.Description: HandBrake is a tool for converting video from nearly any format to a selection of modern, widely supported codecs.[br][br]Full GUI in a RDP container accessible via browser.[br]Use the /media mapping for movies to be converted.[br]The /config mapping is for storing settings for handbrake. /watch is a watch folder. Files dropped into this folder will be automatically converted into /output.[br][br][b]To increase screen resolution, set the HEIGHT and WIDTH environment variables.[/b] To allow HandBrake to be run at a lower priority, add [b]--cap-add=SYS_NICE[/b] under the extra params setting. For additional usage information, visit [b]https://hub.docker.com/r/coppit/handbrake/[/b].
Container.Overview: HandBrake is a video encoder. Connect using an RDP client or web browser, or use the fully automated watch folder.
